definition: Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4

sentences.english: The following is the text of Senator Clinton's letter today to the Secretary of the Army.
sentences.chinese: 全文如下參議員克林頓的一封信，今天陸軍大臣。

sentences.english: Mr. Clinton flew to his home in Chappaqua, N. Y.
sentences.chinese: 隨後克林頓搭機前往其在紐約查巴克的家。

sentences.english: Clinton and Mezvinsky share a special moment at the altar.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓和梅茲文斯基在聖壇分享這個特別的時刻。

sentences.english: Clinton, herself, has advocated a "positive and cooperative" relationship with Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓提倡與北京保持“積極合作”的關係。

sentences.english: President Bill Clinton paid a 9-day visit to China in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 1998年，克林頓總統也對中國進行了9天訪問。

sentences.english: President Clinton revived a tough provision of U. S. trade law in an attempt.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓總統重新祭出美國貿易法中強硬的一條條文。

sentences.english: Wisconsin should have been a competitive state for Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓在威斯康星本該很有競爭力。

sentences.english: Now, Hamilton College in Clinton, N.Y., says it will phase out merit scholarships altogether.
sentences.chinese: 紐約克林頓市的哈密爾頓學院說它將逐步淘汰獎學金。

sentences.english: What does Horsey think of the Democrats' fascination with Clinton?
sentences.chinese: 霍爾西是如何看待民主黨人對克林頓的迷戀呢？

sentences.english: She became first lady of the United States in nineteen ninety-three, after Bill Clinton was elected president.
sentences.chinese: 她成爲在九三年美國第一夫人，在克林頓當選總統。
“克林頓當時笑着承認”通常穿三角褲“。

sentences.english: I have won more of the popular vote than Senator Clinton. I have more delegates than Senator Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 我比克林頓參議員贏得了更多的黨內代表的票數。

sentences.english: Clinton let China shot to launch one of our sdinedllites into sp_ web.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓曾讓直試着收射我們的一顆衛星到太空。

sentences.english: Clinton made the remarks during a speech at an all women's college called Dar al-Hekma.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓在一所女校發表講話時發表上述評論。

sentences.english: His predecessor Bill Clinton did not escape "criticism from Confucius" either.
sentences.chinese: 他的前任克林頓也沒能逃脫來自孔子的“諄諄教誨”。
克林頓將在1996年成爲總統。

definition: Taiwanese variant of 奧巴馬|奥巴马[Ao4 ba1 ma3], Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
governor (of a province or colony)/US state governor/premier (Australian states)
(Tw) Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, president 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress
member of the US House of Representatives
